text: The Social Networks and Third-Party Services that you choose to integrate with our Services may collect, store, and process your information from various locations around the world according to their own terms and privacy policies.

The Social Networks and Third-Party Services that you choose to integrate with our Services may collect, store, and process your information from various locations around the world according to their own terms and privacy policies.

We collect and process information about the creators you engage with their content, the level at which you support them, what benefits you receive and how often you support them.
We collect information automatically as you navigate the site or through our third-party analytics providers.
We may request information from you at in-person and online events.
We process your information to:
We retain your information only as long as required to provide the Services requested by you, for record keeping purposes, to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce the terms for the Services.
You must also provide us with additional information for tax purposes.
We may collect and store your email address, your comments and your profile information from our blog sites to better understand your interests and improve our services to you.
We use Cookies on our website that collect information to allow us and third parties to understand your use of Fanclb.
We may collect and store your email address, your comments and your profile information from our blog sites to better understand your interests and improve our services to you.
For example, information about you may be provided to our customer support specialists to help you with your requests.

Please note that we may need to retain certain information about you for as long as you maintain an account for our Services, to provide you with our Services, for record keeping purposes, for payment processing, to comply with our legal and regulatory obligations, to resolve disputes, or to enforce the applicable terms of service or other agreement in place between you (or your organization) and Fanclb (the "Terms of Service").
These features may collect your IP address and other personal data, including which page you are visiting on our site, and may set a cookie to enable the feature to function properly.

Fanclb also uses third-party service providers, such as managed hosting providers, credit card processors, and technology partners to provide the software, networking, infrastructure and other services required to operate the Services.
These third-party providers may process or store personal data on servers outside of the EEA and Switzerland, including in Canada or the US.

We will store your survey responses as and when you participate in the surveys.
